original_text: He left Babylon on the first day of the first month and he arrived in Jerusalem on the first day of the fifth month. God had helped him with his journey.
korean_text: 첫째 달 초하루에 바벨론에서 길을 떠났고 하나님의 선한 손의 도우심을 입어 다섯째 달 초하루에 예루살렘에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: He left Babylon on the first day of the first month
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 첫째 달 첫째 날에 바빌론을 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: and he arrived in Jerusalem on the first day of the fifth month
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯째 달 첫째 날에 예루살렘에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: God had helped him with his journey
